snippet: The Yankees have been hit with an $18.9 million luxury tax by Major League Baseball, the 10th consecutive year they will pay a penalty for their spending.
abstract: New York Yankees are hit with $18.9 million luxury tax by Major League Baseball, 10th consecutive year they will incur a penalty for their spending.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees have been hit with an $18.9 million luxury tax by Major League Baseball, the 10th consecutive year they will pay a penalty for their spending.

headline.main: Yankees Hit With Luxury Tax Again
